text: John Teerlinck (April 9, 1951 - May 10, 2020) was an American professional football player and coach. He was born in New Rochelle, New York. From 1974 to 1977, he played for the San Diego Chargers. From 2002 to 2012, he was a defensive line coach for the Indianapolis Colts. He also coached the Los Angeles Rams, Cleveland Browns, Minnesota Vikings, Detroit Lions and the Denver Broncos. Teerlinck died on May 10, 2020 at the age of 69. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2020 deaths Category:National Football League coaches Category:San Diego Chargers players Category:Sportspeople from New Rochelle, New York Category:Sportspeople from Rochester, New York
title: John Teerlinck
